#summary An example Java Maven Project
#labels Featured

== An example project configuration (pom.xml)
for using fitnesse-launcher-maven-plugin
to execute FitNesse integration tests for a simple java project ==

  # [http://fitnesse-launcher-maven-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/fitnesse-launcher-java-example/ Download the example java maven project]
  # Run `FitNesse` as a wiki server using:
{{{
mvn clean install -P wiki
}}}
  # Visit `http://localhost:8787/JavaExample` and explore!
  # Run `FitNesse` as automated integration tests using:
{{{
mvn clean install -P auto
}}}
